activities: Online service for work collaboration. No personal information beyond a user's e-mail address is required to utilize the service. Individuals who opt to subscribe to the service are required to provide contact information along with their payment details.

recoursemech:
Independent recourse mechanism to investigate unresolved complaints is available via TRUSTe.
Safe Harbor questions, complaints, access requests or any other issues arising under Safe Harbor may be addressed to finance at smartsheet.com or submitted via www.smartsheet.com using the Safe Harbor category within the Contact Us form.
